Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer at $9500. This price reflects the product's true worth and the opportunity it presents to you. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be securing a high-quality asset at an exclusive rate. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product into your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
